articles.title: Choe Thae Bok Meets Vietnamese Ambassador
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets Vietnamese Ambassador 
   Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a conversation with Phan Trong Thai, Vietnamese ambassador to the DPRK who paid a farewell call on him, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Tuesday.

articles.title: Delegation of Ministry of Public Health Leaves for Bhutan
articles.content:
Delegation of Ministry of Public Health Leaves for Bhutan 
   Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Ministry of Public Health led by Minister Choe Chang Sik left here today to participate in the 25th meeting of health ministers of Southeast Asian regional countries of WHO and its 60th regional assembly to be held in Bhutan.
